snippet: The hacking scandal at Rupert Murdoch’s British newspapers widened on Thursday when a lawmaker said police investigations had spread to the flagship Times of London.
abstract: Hacking scandal at Rupert Murdoch's British newspapers widens when police confirm that they are investigating the flagship Times of London for incident in 2009 in which one of the paper’s reporters apparently hacked an e-mail account; officials at the judicial inquiry into press ethics say they will recall the paper’s editor for further testimony.
lead_paragraph: The hacking scandal at Rupert Murdoch’s British newspapers widened on Thursday when a lawmaker said police investigations had spread to the flagship Times of London.

headline.seo: Hacking Questions at Times of London
headline.main: Questions on Hacking for Times of London
headline.print_headline: Questions On Hacking For Times Of London
